name: TWO (Falty, Eleaf, Brieux "Thazerr" Caquelin, Kpatain, hns707)
name_original: TWO (Falty, Eleaf, Brieux "Thazerr" Caquelin, Kpatain, hns707)
description:
Witness the past of an old abandonned station. Be careful, nobody knows what happened here.

How to get the game : Download the Zip on this drive https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1DIhqolMMS8-J3PNigv6cUYCFvuLC8dZf?usp=sha... Extract on your desktop, then open the windows folder and launch the .exe file !
